# Data processing

## Data set EDU01a

### Import the Data

```{r, echo=FALSE}
suppressPackageStartupMessages(library(tidyverse))
```


```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(readr)
census_1a <- read_csv("https://www4.stat.ncsu.edu/~online/datasets/EDU01a.csv")
head(census_1a)
```

### Select and Pivot

```{r}
census_1a <- census_1a |>
  select(ends_with("D"), Area_name, STCOU) |>
  rename(area_name = Area_name)
census_1a
# |>
# pivot_longer()
```
